title: [Old Version] McAfee AntiVirus Protection Plus 2022 | 10 Device | Internet Security Software | Windows/Mac/Android/iOS | 1 Year Subscription | Key Card
description: Award-winning protection so you can enjoy life online. McAfee® AntiVirus delivers a comprehensive, simple solution that protects you online, wherever and whenever. McAfee protections, including antivirus, are fully compatible with Windows 11. Both new Windows 11 users and those that upgrade from Windows 10 will be protected without interruption.
